017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
023
024import org.apiguardian.api.API;
025import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
026import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.UtilityClass;
027import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.NullArgumentException;
028import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError;
029import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber.SVGDegree;
030import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber.SVGMillimeter;
031import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber.SVGPercent;
032import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber.SVGPixel;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber.SVGUserUnitValue;
034
035/**
036 *  <p>{@summary The class {@code SVGCalculator} provide functions to perform
037 *  calculations on instances of
038 *  {@link SVGNumber }
039 *  and its subclasses.}</p>
040 *
041 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
042 *  @version $Id: HexUtils.java 747 2020-12-01 12:40:38Z tquadrat $
043 *  @since 0.4.7
044 *
045 *  @UMLGraph.link
046 */
047@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: HexUtils.java 747 2020-12-01 12:40:38Z tquadrat $" )
048@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
049@UtilityClass
050public final class SVGCalculator
051{
052        /*--------------*\
053    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
054        \*--------------*/
055    /**
056     *  No instance allowed for this class!
057     */
058    private SVGCalculator() { throw new PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError( SVGCalculator.class ); }
059
060        /*---------*\
061    ====** Methods **==========================================================
062        \*---------*/
063    /**
064     *  Increases the given instance of
065     *  {@link SVGNumber}
066     *  by the given increment and returns the result.
067     *
068     *  @param  <T> The type of the value.
069     *  @param  value   The value.
070     *  @param  increment   The increment.
071     *  @return The result.
072     */
073    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
074    public static final <T extends SVGNumber> T increase( final T value, final double increment )
075    {
076        final var amount = requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ).number().doubleValue() + increment;
077        final var retValue = newNumber( value, amount );
078
079        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
080        return retValue;
081    }   //  increase()
082
083    /**
084     *  Multiplies the given instance of
085     *  {@link SVGNumber}
086     *  with the given factor and returns the result.
087     *
088     *  @param  <T> The type of the value.
089     *  @param  value   The value.
090     *  @param  factor  The factor.
091     *  @return The result.
092     */
093    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
094    public static final <T extends SVGNumber> T multiply( final T value, final double factor )
095    {
096        final var amount = requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ).number().doubleValue() * factor;
097        final var retValue = newNumber( value, amount );
098
099        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
100        return retValue;
101    }   //  multiply()
102
103    /**
104     *  Creates a new instance of
105     *  {@link SVGNumber}
106     *  with the given type and amount.
107     *
108     *  @param  <T> The type of the value.
109     *  @param  value   The value.
110     *  @param  amount  The amount.
111     *  @return The result.
112     */
113    @SuppressWarnings( "unchecked" )
114    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.4.7" )
115    private static final <T extends SVGNumber> T newNumber( final T value, final double amount )
116    {
117        final var retValue = switch( requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ) )
118        {
119            case final SVGDegree $ -> (T) new SVGDegree( amount );
120            case final SVGMillimeter $ -> (T) new SVGMillimeter( amount );
121            case final SVGPercent $ -> (T) new SVGPercent( amount );
122            case final SVGPixel $ -> (T) new SVGPixel( amount );
123            case final SVGUserUnitValue $ -> (T) new SVGUserUnitValue( amount );
124            default -> (T) new SVGNumber( amount, value.unit() );
125        };
126
127        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
128        return retValue;
129    }   //  newNumber()
130
131    /**
132     *  Reduces the given instance of
133     *  {@link SVGNumber}
134     *  by the given decrement and returns the result.
135     *
136     *  @param  <T> The type of the value.
137     *  @param  value   The value.
138     *  @param  decrement   The decrement.
139     *  @return The result.
140     */
141    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
142    public static final <T extends SVGNumber> T reduce( final T value, final double decrement )
143    {
144        final var amount = requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ).number().doubleValue() - decrement;
145        final var retValue = newNumber( value, amount );
146
147        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
148        return retValue;
149    }   //  reduce()
150
151    /**
152     *  Returns an instance of
153     *  {@link SVGMillimeter}
154     *  whose value corresponds with that of the given value.
155     *
156     *  @param  input   The input value.
157     *  @return The corresponding value as {@code SVGMillimeter}.
158     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The given value cannot be converted
159     *      to an instance of {@code SVGMillimeter}.
160     */
161    @SuppressWarnings( {"OverlyComplexMethod", "NestedSwitchStatement"} )
162    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
163    public static final SVGMillimeter toMillimeter( final SVGNumber input )
164    {
165        final var retValue = switch( input )
166        {
167            case null -> throw new NullArgumentException( "input" );
168            case final SVGDegree ignored -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert SVGDegree to millimeter" );
169            case final SVGPercent ignored -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert SVGPercent to millimeter" );
170            case final SVGMillimeter value -> value;
171            case final SVGPixel value -> new SVGMillimeter( value.number().doubleValue() * 25.4 / 96.0 );
172            case final SVGUserUnitValue value -> new SVGMillimeter( value.number().doubleValue() * 25.4 / 96.0 );
173            default -> switch( input.unit() )
174            {
175                case INCH -> new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() * 25.4 );
176                case PICA -> new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() * 12.7 / 3.0 );
177                case POINT -> new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() * 0.352778 );
178                case CENTIMETER -> input.isInteger()
179                    ? new SVGMillimeter( input.number().longValue() * 10 )
180                    : new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() *10.0 );
181                case MILLIMETER -> input.isInteger()
182                    ? new SVGMillimeter( input.number().longValue() )
183                    : new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() );
184                case PIXEL -> new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() * 25.4 / 96.0 );
185                default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert %s to millimeter".formatted( input.unit().name() ) );
186            };
187        };
188
189        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
190        return retValue;
191    }   //  toMillimeter()
192
193    /**
194     *  Returns an instance of
195     *  {@link SVGPixel}
196     *  whose value corresponds with that of the given value.
197     *
198     *  @param  input   The input value.
199     *  @return The corresponding value as {@code SVGMPixel}.
200     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The given value cannot be converted
201     *      to an instance of {@code SVGPixel}.
202     */
203    @SuppressWarnings( {"OverlyComplexMethod", "NestedSwitchStatement"} )
204    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
205    public static final SVGPixel toPixel( final SVGNumber input )
206    {
207        final var retValue = switch( input )
208        {
209            case null -> throw new NullArgumentException( "input" );
210            case final SVGDegree ignored -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert SVGDegree to millimeter" );
211            case final SVGPercent ignored -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert SVGPercent to millimeter" );
212            case final SVGMillimeter value -> new SVGPixel( value.number().doubleValue() * 96.0 / 25.4 );
213            case final SVGPixel value -> value;
214            case final SVGUserUnitValue value -> value.isInteger()
215                ? new SVGPixel( value.number().longValue() )
216                : new SVGPixel( value.number().doubleValue() );
217            default -> switch( input.unit() )
218            {
219                case INCH -> new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() * 96.0 );
220                case PICA -> new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() * 16.0 );
221                case POINT -> new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() * 6.0 / 8.0 );
222                case CENTIMETER -> new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() * 960.0 / 25.4 );
223                case MILLIMETER -> new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() * 96.0 / 25.4 );
224                case PIXEL -> input.isInteger()
225                    ? new SVGPixel( input.number().longValue() )
226                    : new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() );
227                default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert %s to millimeter".formatted( input.unit().name() ) );
228            };
229        };
230
231        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
232        return retValue;
233    }   //  toMillimeter()
234}
235//  class SVGCalculator
236
237/*
238 *  End of File
239 */
